main event: Five round very brilliant objects were observed in echelon formation over Fort Lauderdale, Florida, circling and then following a cargo plane.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes,The objects were described as very brilliant and round in shape,The objects appeared to follow a cargo plane and then two continued west,The report includes various possible explanations for the objects including balloons and astronomical phenomena,The investigator was not alerted until 15 minutes after the objects were no longer visible.
sighted object: five round very brilliant objects in echelon formation
